task.title: Logging in and out
task.shortdesc: Use the Sametime app to login to a Sametime community.

prereq.p: You must start the HCL Sametime app before logging in. To find Sametime on your device, look for the Sametime icon.
Additionally, a community must be configured to log into its chat community.

step.cmd: On the Log in screen, enter your credentials in the User ID and Password fields.
step.info: If your login process is by password the Password field apprears. If the login requires your corporate credentials, you are redirected to your corporate web page to complete the login process.

step.cmd: Select you availability status in the Status field. The default is I am available.
step.info:
You can set your status as one of the following:
I am available
I am away
In a meeting
Do not disturb
After you are logged in, the status displays below your name.
After your credentials are verified, the Sametime Chat screen is displayed.

step.cmd: To exit chat, click the menu icon and select Logout.
